function isAtomicRequestValid(address offer,address user,(uint64 deadline,uint88 atomicPrice,uint96 offerAmount,bool inSolve) userRequest) view returns (bool)
function updateAtomicRequest(address offer,address want,(uint64 deadline,uint88 atomicPrice,uint96 offerAmount,bool inSolve) userRequest) external
function solve(address offer, address want, address[] users, bytes runData, address solver) external
function userAtomicRequest(address user,address offer,address want) view returns (uint64 deadline,uint88 atomicPrice,uint96 offerAmount,bool inSolve)
